ruling: - Discarding 1 card is a cost to activate this effect.
- If you discard a Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster to activate [[Lumina, Lightsworn Summoner]]'s effect, you can Special Summon it.
- You cannot activate [[Lumina, Lightsworn Summoner]]'s effect if you do not have any Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monsters in your Graveyard, even if you would discard one to activate the effect.
- If an effect is chained that removes [[Lumina, Lightsworn Summoner]] from the field, the targeted "Lightsworn" monster is still Special Summoned.
- See [[Jain, Lightsworn Paladin]] for additional rulings.
